text: Wow, there are more than I thought──...

Good morning, Juri.
Sorry for bothering you so early.
No, it's important work, so it's fine.
So, about the questions from fans...

I see.
Looks like everyone has a lot they want to ask you, Juri.

Just start with the ones you can answer,
and leave the rest to me.

It's not really a struggle, but...
Can I ask you something?

What do you do without fail every morning?'
That's the question...

Like brushing your teeth or washing your face,
I don't think they're looking for answers like that, right...?

It's okay to answer honestly.
You can expand on it from there.

Hey, Juri.
You often go for a morning run, right?
Well, yeah. But it's not every day...

Haha...
To me, it seems like you go every day.

"I've fallen in love with someone I've always wanted to stay friends with.
Should I confess?"

How should I respond to something like this...
I don't even know the details about this person or the situation...
──Wait, why am I getting love advice...?

Haha... Yeah.
Thanks for taking it seriously.

Maybe they want to know what you, Juri,
would do in that situation?
Understood, I'll think about this one later...
To have Juri take their questions so seriously like this.
...Well then, a question for you, Juri-san.

"I admire how seriously you take any question.
How can I become more like you, Juri-san?"

"How to become like me... I still don't know,
but maybe you'll understand if you keep watching."
